name: SoftBody 2D
description: This a project of Softbody 2D in Godot. It is hard to make softbody 2D in Godot so, i made it so, that developers could use it in their projects. It took a lot to build this project. Support me on Itch.io! Feel Free to use it in your game. Source Code : https://github.com/TeenCreator/SoftBody-2D-In-Godot. To get these Better SoftBodies in Future your, Support is needed. Your Support would be highly helpful Thanks!
